reg_pit.acttitle: Business Practices and Consumer Protection Act
reg_pit.title: Government Cheque Cashing Fees Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 169/2019, effective September 15, 2019.

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, government assistance cheque means a government cheque that is issued

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: to a recipient under the Employment and Assistance Act to provide income assistance, hardship assistance or a supplement under that Act, or
to a recipient under the Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act to provide disability assistance, hardship assistance or a supplement under that Act.
